instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: macbook a1502 very slowly works on windows 10
threads.message:
Hello, please help me to go out from that charmed circle...

I made fresh high Sierra install on a1502 2013. then made bootcamp 100gb and when trying install it hands in random progress levels.

tried instal win when ssd was in MacBook Air, on it works perfect.

tried same ssd on other a1502 also works normal

when put back to primary a1502 it hangs on booting, one time booted till windows desktop, but cursor ir circle turning around. on Mac OS works perfect. 

tried PRAM reset, all same :(

threads.title: macbook a1502 very slowly works on windows 10
threads.message: No idea, it is Windows so yeah. Swap the board with another machine that never will use Windows.
